desc:
You are living in debt
due to greed
What will you do?
option: It's too much... (Sigh...)
Start planning what you can do.

desc:
A stranger comes
and talk to you.
"Would you like to play a game
and bet 100,000 won?"
option: You have to go down to see it! GO!
Who is he? Let’s just ignore him...

desc:
The first game has started.
If you fail, you will be shot to death.
"Green Light, Red Light"
option: 5 minutes left... let’s go forward
Watch the others first.

desc:
You found out that your buddy,
whom you haven't seen in a long
time, is also in the squid game.
What do you?
option: Long time so see
It's been too long. Pretend we don't know

desc:
A fight broke out during the
distribution of bread and milk.
How do you behave?
option: Don't fight, let's talk it out together
it has nothing to do with me. Just stay quiet

desc:
After the game is over,
the shocked participants
will have a vote to stop the game.
What is your choice?
option: Stop this madness! We are all going to die!
My actual life is worse. Just continue

desc:
You found out that the next game was
the Cinder Toffee (Dalgona) game.
Will you share this
with your team members?
option: Reducing competitors comes first
Inform our team members

desc:
It feels like there's going to be
a riot during the night...
How do you act
when you might get killed?
option: Look around and hope it will work out somehow
Plan for survival with your team members

desc:
The next game is a team fight.
I need a team,
but what do I do...
option: Gather your team members
Someone will pick me as their team...

desc:
While forming a tug-of-war game team,
you discover a cheater,
player 212, who has been betrayed.
I think it will be an advantageous game
for adult men... What will you do?
option: Pick her just in case
Still. I choose a man, Player 001

desc:
The next game is marble.
In a pair of two, at least
one of the two will be eliminated.
You teammate forgot what he said
'What did I say...'
option: Just take it
I can never take it

desc:
In the middle of the stepping stone
game, at the last stepping stone,
the player in front hesitates and can't
go forward. Time is running out...
option: Running out of time. Just push him!
Just give him some more time

desc:
Only two players are left.
Tomorrow is
option: Winning comes first. Let's go to sleep
Imagine what tomorrow game might be.

desc:
You are going to see your daughter for
the first time after winning the game.
What do you think about the night
before?
option: I need to go to bed early and see my daughter tomorrow.
What should I do when I meet my daughter?
